Package io.atomix.copycat.client

Asynchronous Raft client API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Command<T>
    Raft state commands modify system state.
    Operation<T>
    Base type for Raft state operations.
    Query<T>
    Raft state queries read system state.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Command.Builder<T extends Command.Builder<T,U,V>,U extends Command<V>,V>
    Base builder for commands.
    CopycatClient
    Provides an interface for submitting commands and Query queries to the Raft cluster.
    CopycatClient.Builder
    Builds a new Raft client.
    Event<T>
    Client event.
    Operation.Builder<T extends Operation.Builder<T,U,V>,U extends Operation<V>,V>
    Base builder for Raft state operations.
    Query.Builder<T extends Query.Builder<T,U,V>,U extends Query<V>,V>
    Base builder for queries.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Command.ConsistencyLevel
    Constants for specifying Raft Command consistency levels.
    Command.PersistenceLevel
    Constants for specifying Raft command persistence levels.
    Query.ConsistencyLevel
    Constants for specifying Raft Query consistency levels.

Package io.atomix.copycat.client Description

Asynchronous Raft client API.

Jordan Halterman
